channel.title: Katy Cowell's Github
channel.description: Recent content on Katy Cowell's Github

item.title: Play Like A Girl
item.description: Nearing the end of an abysmal 2021-2022 athletics season, Huskers fans should be entitled to financial compensation for pain and suffering. Unless you live under a rock, it’s no secret that Nebraska football, baseball and men’s basketball have not performed well this year. And that’s putting it rather nicely. Each week, the Husker faithful showed up decked out in red to witness the men’s teams choke over and over again.

item.title: Nebraska's $11-million Question
item.description: After a 1-16 Big Ten season record, there was chatter around Nebraska regarding the job security of one of the state’s highest-paid employees. Everyone and their brother were talking about whether Nebraska men’s basketball head coach, Fred Hoiberg, should come back for another year. There were $18.5 million reasons for him to stay, but public pressure and a not so pretty track record led to a restructured contract that reduced Hoiberg’s buyout to only $11 million.
